page.title: 07HUMSHAUGH HOUSING
page.content: MANY DIFFERENT TYPES OF HOUSING EXIST BOTH PRIVATELY OWNED LIKE THE MODERN ESTATE OF 13 HOUSES AT VALLEY COURT AND RENTED ACCOMMODATION. THIS IN- CLUDES{TIED COTTAGES}FOR FARM WORKERS, HOUSES PROVIDED FOR STAFF AT THE GEORGE HOTEL,{COUNCIL HOUSES}EG WAYNRIGGS TERRACE (SOME OF WHICH ARE NOW BEING BOUGHT BY THE TENANTS), OLD PEOPLES' BUNGALOWS ALSO OWNED BY THE COUNCIL,{HOLIDAY COTTAGES }AND A GROUP OF DWELLINGS OWNED BY THE EVANS TRUST, A LOCAL CHARITY. OF THE 7 COTTAGES BUILT AT LINCOLN HILL FOR FARM WORKERS ON THE LOCAL ESTATE ONLY 2 ARE IN- HABITED BY FARM WORKERS NOW. UNDER CONSTRUCTION IS A SITE OF 10 BUNGALOWS NEAR THE GEORGE AT Â£85,000 EACH AND 2 BUNGALOWS IN THE VILLAGE CENTRE. MOST OF THE VILLAGE DWELLINGS HAVE TYPICAL COLOURFUL COUNTRY GARDENS WHICH BLEND BEAUTIFULLY WITH THE{STONE BUILDINGS.
